subject: RE: [junit] Database for tests using JUnit.
msgSnippet: I invite you to take a look at DbUnit. This is a JUnit extension I wrote to perform unit testing with databases. http://www.dbunit.org Manuel Laflamme,
messageBody:
I invite you to take a look at DbUnit. This is a JUnit extension I wrote to
perform unit testing with databases.

http://www.dbunit.org

Manuel Laflamme, Software Architect
Freeborders Canada
manuel.laflamme@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Prashant [mailto:prashant_ideas@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 04, 2002 8:34 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Database for tests using JUnit.


Hello,
Can someone please explain me the how to create a
Comma seperated database file which can be given as
input to A JUnit testcase and the result be redirected
to another textfile. I wonder if someone has already
worked on something similar to this. I would
appreciate if someone could atleast point me towards
some article related to this topic.

thanks,
Prashant.
